channel.title: SCAR help pl0x! -.-
channel.description:
Well i'm following the SCAR auto tut in here and i get to the part where it says --Other Setup--.
Where do i declare that?
Here's what my script looks like so far.
[code]program New;
begin
const tree = 3693687; //Colour of the middle tree section.
end.[/code]

item.title: SCAR help pl0x! -.-
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

Ok first of all, DONT use MoveMouse or ClickMouse. They will get you banned!
The SRL procedure for MoveMouse is MMouse, and the SRL procedure for ClickMouse is Mouse.

And you need to write the whole script before you try running and testing it, not just one procedure. So write the whole script, then we can help you more.

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR help pl0x! -.-
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

Ok, it now loks like this

[code]program Scripterftw;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}

const
treeftw=4353677; //Tree centre

procedure chop;
begin
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treeftw,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
MoveMouse(492,359);
Wait(1000);
ClickMouse(492,359,true);
end else;

end.[/code]

and i get this error

Failed when compiling Line 15: [Error] (14731:5): Semicolon (';') expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.05\Scripts\Hi sean.scar

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR help pl0x! -.-
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Oh, use the end else function.

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR help pl0x! -.-
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

- - - - - Other Setup - - - - -
Other setup is required so that the script knows what to do incase something ‘irregular’ happens, such as you log out by accident, you get a lamp for a genie, you are attacked etc.

Well i changed my SCAR to this,

[code]program Scripterftw;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}

const
treeftw=4353677; //Tree centre

procedure chop;
begin
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treeftw,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
MoveMouse(492,359);
Wait(1000);
ClickMouse(492,359,true);
end;

end.[/code]

I want it so if it finds the colour shown above ^^, it moves the mouse to those co-ords ^^, (Wich is the co-ords on runescape where i found the colour), waits 1 second, then clicks the mouse in those co-ords.

Read full topic
